price: Nítorí náà, ẹ máa rántí ohun tí mò ń sọ fún yín. Mo sì ń fi ọ̀rọ̀ mi tì sí ọ̀dọ̀ Allāhu. Dájúdájú Allāhu ni Olùríran nípa àwọn ẹrúsìn.”
arabic: فَسَتَذۡكُرُونَ مَآ أَقُولُ لَكُمۡۚ وَأُفَوِّضُ أَمۡرِيٓ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ بَصِيرُۢ بِٱلۡعِبَادِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
